item.description:
It's the Beatles!! Well, ok the best local cover band!! The cover charge is $12. Come rock the night away!

From Johnny D's website:
The number of Beatle Tribute bands is probably countless, but in New England, at least, none come more highly praised, critiqued or recommended as Beatle Juice. This band has taken on a history of its own. Their talent and showmanship go far beyond the norm in tribute bands. Sadly, with the recent passing of singer Brad Delp, their legacy draws even closer to that of the Fab Four's. Doing their best to fill Delp's Beatle Boots will be an array of local singers. Come Together for a special night of Mersey-side magic.

***New location!!! I'll try to be on the other side from where you pay. Pay at the door, turn left and go down the ramp. Turn left and I should be there...at least until the music starts. 

 

 

http://www.johnnyds.com/bands/beatlejuice/

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DQbzSGW7_vA(watch for Muzz at 5:00!)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7OPkJBgIpaU&feature=player_embedded

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kqfb4I_FzOM

Paul has posted this meetup in three other meetup groups.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a meetup button/will give out Cell Phone # the night before.
item.name: Beatlejuice at Johnny D's Saturday 1/19 at 8:30PM
